subject: Football
Snow and Snowstorms
lead_paragraph: Lost in all the hype over frosty weather and frosty relationships was the Jets turning an expected blowout into a real game. But the Patriots still won to move to 14-0.
snippet: Lost in all the hype over frosty weather and frosty relationships was the Jets turning an expected blowout into a real game. But the Patriots still won to move to 14-0.
